item.description: On Thursday, June 28, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Disproofaphobia and the Justification of Disproof Atheism,” a discussion about proving negatives, re-defining God, and seeking certainty, based on M. Martin, Atheism: A Philosophical Justification (1990), pp. 29-39, 281-85, and N. Everitt, The Nonexistence of God (2004), pp. 1-16, 301-06. In Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free, open to all. Info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproofaphobia & the Justification of Disproof Atheism (a philosophical talk)
